entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Quesnel Airport 07:00 AM PST Saturday 11 February 2023

Temperature: 0.1°C

Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 69 %
Dewpoint: -4.9°C

Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness then snow beginning this morning and ending this afternoon. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 5 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Light wet snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy late this evening then light wet snow. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Light wet snow. High 7.
entry.summary: Light wet snow ending in the morning then clearing. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 11 February 2023
